<entry name="AdeptusMechanicus/AdditionalCognisHeavyStubber" value="Grants this unit additional Cognis Heavy Stubber.
"/>
<entry name="AdeptusMechanicus/GravitonPullDescription" value="Slowed down. Takes more damage with upgrade."/>
<entry name="AdeptusMechanicus/MasterOfMachinesFlavor" value="“Our enemies may rest but rust never sleeps.”
—Tech-Priest Jung, Forge World Gehenna"/>
<entry name="AstraMilitarum/GunnerDescription" value="Increases the accuracy of ranged attack against enemy units adjacent to Tempestus Scion, Bullgryn or Scout Sentinels with upgrade."/> <entry name="AstraMilitarum/ImperialStrongpointDamageReduction1" value=""/> <entry name="AstraMilitarum/ImperialStrongpointDamageReduction1Description" value=""/> <entry name="AstraMilitarum/ImperialStrongpointDamageReduction1Flavor" value=""/> <entry name="AstraMilitarum/ImperialStrongpointDamageReduction2" value=""/> <entry name="AstraMilitarum/ImperialStrongpointDamageReduction2Description" value=""/> <entry name="AstraMilitarum/ImperialStrongpointDamageReduction2Flavor" value=""/> <entry name="AstraMilitarum/ImperialStrongpointDamageReduction3" value=""/> <entry name="AstraMilitarum/ImperialStrongpointDamageReduction3Description" value=""/> <entry name="AstraMilitarum/ImperialStrongpointDamageReduction3Flavor" value=""/>
<entry name="AstraMilitarum/ImperiumOfManFlavor" value="”The martyr's grave is the keystone of the Imperium.”
— The Liber Imperialis"/>
<entry name="AstraMilitarum/PowerOfTheMachineSpirit" value=""/> <entry name="AstraMilitarum/PowerOfTheMachineSpiritDescription" value=". Increases the health regeneration with upgrade."/> <entry name="AstraMilitarum/PowerOfTheMachineSpiritFlavor" value=""/>
<entry name="AstraMilitarum/SeniorOfficerBullgrynEnemyDescription" value="Increases the accuracy of ranged attacks of Basilisks, Hydras and Scout Sentinels with upgrade against this unit."/>
<entry name="AstraMilitarum/SeniorOfficerTempestusEnemyDescription" value="Increases the accuracy of ranged attack of Basilisks and Hydras and Scout Sentinels with upgrade against this unit."/>
<entry name="AstraMilitarum/WallOfMuscleFlavor" value="“Brute force not work? It because you not use enough of it!“
—Karg, Ogryn Bone'ead"/>

<entry name="SistersOfBattle/BeaconOfFaithAllyFlavor" value="“The Khornate warriors threatened to overwhelm us, we were cut and rent and thrown aside… even the Canoness fell… and then She intervened. As She descended, a shining beacon, our wounds closed, our spirits rallied and we drove back the heretics with newfound devotion…”
— Unknown remembrancer, Gospel of the Webway"/>
<entry name="SistersOfBattle/BeaconOfFaithEnemyFlavor" value="“The Khornate warriors threatened to overwhelm us, we were cut and rent and thrown aside… even the Canoness fell… and then She intervened. As She descended, a shining beacon, our wounds closed, our spirits rallied and we drove back the heretics with newfound devotion…”
— Unknown remembrancer, Gospel of the Webway"/>

<entry name="Tau/FriendsToAllFlavor" value="“Soldiers of the Fire Caste! Kroot and Vespid allies! Today, we stand as a bulwark against the selfish, the soulless, and the mad!”
— Aun'el Shi'ores, at the loss of Kronus"/>
<entry name="Tau/VolleyFireFlavor" value="“I’m not going to teach you a special deathblow. I’m not going to give you a bigger gun. I’m not going to surround you with magic shield drones willing to die for you. But I am going to teach you to shoot straight, under fire, together. That immediately makes you better than every last Gue’la.”
— Tutor Sharptongue."/>
<entry name="FrightFlavor" value=""/>
